name: Blaster_Support.Radiation_Manipulation
display_help: You have complete control over atomic particles and waves, and can use them to disable and weaken your enemies, as well as boost your own power. Many of your powers have the ability to surround your targets with negatrons or positrons. Should you combine both of these in a single target, it will result in Electron-Positron annihilation producing a burst of Gamma Rays which will inflict a small amount of damage, and in addition debuff the target's damage output and accuracy. Enemies also have a small chance of being stunned or confused.

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Radiation_Manipulation.Electron_Shackles
powers.display_help: Immobilizes a single target and deals some energy damage over time. Some more resilient foes may require multiple attacks to Immobilize. Electron Shackles can also reduce a target's Defense and will surround it in negatively charged particles. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast

display_info: 10 ticks of 7.19 energy damage over 4.75s on target
5 ticks of 21.21 energy damage over 8.2s on target
10000.00% resistance to knockup, knock for 15s on target
-100.0 knockup protection, knock protection for 15s on target
-10.50% strength to defense for 10s on target
7.70% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 8.67s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Radiation_Manipulation.Negatron_Slam
powers.display_help: You channel a greater amount of radiation into your fists and deliver a hard-hitting blow that deals Moderate Energy and Smashing damage to the target as well as reduce their Defense for a short time. The affected target will also be surrounded in negatively charged particles. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
powers.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe -Def, Knockdown, Special

display_info: -10.50% strength to defense for 10s on target
33.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
33.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
9.90% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 9s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Radiation_Manipulation.Positron_Cell
powers.display_help: Encases a single target in a cage made of positrons. The radiation emitted slowly hurts the victim, inflicting energy damage over time. The encased victim is held helpless and unable to defend themselves in addition to being surrounded by positively charged particles. Damage, Moderate, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Energy), Foe Hold, -To Hit

display_info: 5 ticks of 13.76 energy damage over 4.2s on target
5 ticks of 24.14 energy damage over 4.2s on target
-10.50% strength to defense for 10s on target
11.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 9.17s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Radiation_Manipulation.Ionize
powers.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

display_info: 100.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Radiation_Manipulation.Beta_Decay
powers.display_help: While Beta Decay is active, nearby foes will have their chance to hit and defense decreased slightly. You will gain a recharge bonus per nearby target up to 10 targets. The first target grants the largest benefit. Recharge: Moderate

display_info: -10.50% strength to defense for 1s on target
10.00% strength to recharge for 1.25s on self
2.50% strength to recharge for 1s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Radiation_Manipulation.Metabolic_Acceleration
powers.display_help: You cloak yourself in a field of radiation that increases your running speed, attack speed, Endurance recovery and Regeneration rate. However, only half of this regeneration bonus is enhanceable. Your metabolism is increased so much that you become resistant to effects such as Sleep, Hold, Disorient, Immobilization and Endurance Drain. Recharge: Moderate
powers.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Recharge, +Special, +Regeneration, +Recovery, +Res(Hold, Stun, Sleep, Immobilize, End)

display_info: 20.00% strength to recharge for 0.75s on self
27.68% resistance to hold, immobilize, stun, sleep for 0.75s on self
27.68% resistance to endurance debuff, recovery rate debuff for 0.75s on target

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Radiation_Manipulation.Atom_Smasher
powers.display_help: You charge up a dangerously unstable amount of radioactive energy into a single fist before driving it into the ground and causing a small explosion. Foes caught in the blast will suffer High Energy and Toxic damage and have their defense reduced. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: PBAoE, High DMG(Energy/Toxic), Foe -Def, Disorient, Special

display_info: -8.40% strength to defense for 10s on target
25.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 7.15s on target
25.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 2s on target
7.70% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10.43s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Radiation_Manipulation.Radioactive_Cloud
powers.display_help: When activated, you generate toxic radioactive gas around yourself. Any nearby foes may be overcome by the gas, leaving them choking and helpless. Recharge: Long

display_info: 1.80% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 8.57s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Radiation_Manipulation.Positronic_Fist
powers.display_help: You hammer your foe with a brutal smashing attack charged with a lethal dose of radiation. Your target will suffer Extreme Energy and Smashing damage, will have its defense reduced and will be disoriented for a short time in addition to being surrounded by positively charged particles. Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Melee, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe -Def, Disorient, Special
